name: Geneva Information Security Day 2018 Autumn Edition
content: Geneva Information Security Day (GISD) is a leading European cybersecurity conference created as a vendor-independent platform for open and actionable discussion of emerging digital threats and remedies, knowledge sharing and building sustainable cybersecurity industry. Speakers and Panelists C-level cybersecurity executives, cybersecurity visionaries and leaders from all over the world share their knowledge and experience in a comfortable atmosphere of trust and confidence. Discussion Panels Panel I: "Accountability for Data Breaches: CEO, CISO or BoD?". Panel II: "AI in Cybersecurity: Costs, ROI and Economical Practicality". Panel III: "Vendor Risk Management: Cybersecurity Suppliers". Place and Venue 12th of October 2018 13:00 - 19:00 Mandarin Oriental Geneva Hotel \*\*\*\*\* Quai Turrettini 1, CH-1201 Geneva, Switzerland Conditions Participation at Geneva Information Security Day (GISD) is free but reserved for cybersecurity, privacy and GRC practitioners. Participants may be provided with an attendance certificate for Continuous Professional Education (CPE). The number of places is limited, please book you place in advance. https://www.htbridge.com/GISD/
